mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.idx AS "idx", a.keyss AS "keyss", a.name AS "name", a.sname AS "sname", a.service_name AS "serviceName", a.enable AS "enable", a.sort AS "sort", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_yw_gtheme( id, idx, keyss, name, sname, service_name, enable, sort, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idx}, #{keyss}, #{name}, #{sname}, #{serviceName}, #{enable}, #{sort}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )

INSERT INTO act_yw_gtheme( id, idx, keyss, name, sname, service_name, enable, sort, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.idx}, #{item.keyss}, #{item.name}, #{item.sname}, #{item.serviceName}, #{item.enable}, #{item.sort}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_yw_gtheme SET idx = #{idx}, keyss = #{keyss}, name = #{name}, sname = #{sname}, service_name = #{serviceName}, enable = #{enable}, sort = #{sort}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}

DELETE FROM act_yw_gtheme WHERE id in
#{id}
